techmeme.title: Sources: Microsoft is testing ad-supported games streaming internally, allowing employees to play select titles for free without a Game Pass subscription (Tom Warren/The Verge)
LinkedIn sues a company called ProAPIs for allegedly operating millions of fake accounts to scrape LinkedIn member data and selling it for ~$15,000 per month (Suzanne Smalley/The Record)
Lapsus$ publishes a data leak site on the dark web threatening to release about ~1B records stolen from Salesforce-hosted customer databases (TechCrunch)
CISA, the key law that helps the federal government guard against cyber threats to US critical systems, expired when the government shut down (Politico)
Feedzai, which uses AI to detect and prevent financial crimes, raised ~$75M at a $2B valuation (Duncan Riley/SiliconANGLE)
